lines.text: What the hell made you think you could handle Jessie? I bet you used to bring her home flowers.
No, you don't have to do that when you're living in the jungle. You just take her outside and show her what tree you're going to do it under tonight. Hell, we had lots of trees.
So what is it you don't like exactly, football players, tacos, or beer?
I like tacos and beer.
He said the only way I'd get away from him would be to kill him.

[Upset]
Jake hates me. My family hates me. Everyone hates me! I don't believe you've come all this was just to find me.
Guys are crippling themselves for you, lady. I could give a shit what you believe.
[first lines]
Señor! Have you, uh, seen this woman?
Oh - no, sir.
Gracias.
I think about you.
I think about you too lady. Let's leave it at that.
either you want to play football again, or you don't.
[last lines]
Remember, Brogan - you're out of her life.
Figure that's up to her. You're not going to control us forever.
You got problems now, Terry. You want trouble too?
Look, I was a bit of an asshole. You know, I got crazy and I popped her a few times, she came after me with a knife. Just missed my balls.
And was she going for them?
Don't they all?
Say, eh, there's not too much going on on this island. Do you know where I can go to have a good time?
Get off the island. The ferry leaves every morning.
Can I buy you a drink or somethin'?
Nope.
How about a taco?

You never found where I live, did you? I don't think anybody could. Its the prettiest place on the island. Don't leave without saying goodbye. Take the highway out of town to kilometer 19. And when you see the three Tecate cans, its the first dirt road on the right. Don't leave without saying goodbye. Don't leave without saying goodbye.
Would you like a drink?
Alright, that'd be great.
Is Tequila okay?
I ought to get going.
Why? What'd you come here for?
It is just so hard for me to trust anyone!
I'm not anyone.
I know. I know you're not and I'm trying. I *want* to trust you! God, I love you! Oh, I love you.
Hey, come on, the Park's closing. Let's go to the sweat house.
I want a complete catalog of Bob Marley. I'm talkin' about everything - all the records. And I want live concerts, everything, alright?
Kid Creole and the Coconuts!

[singing]
I can't deny we've had some good times/We were like a bike built for two/But I can't lie to you/the rumor's comin' true, oh/Another girl's arousing my - curiosity/Another girl's arousing my - male - curiosity...
I keep trying to think which thing I did in my life made me deserve you.
Go to hell.
Oh, I have, you know that, lady!
It's a little dirty. But, not so dirty, you won't sleep nights.
That idiot football player you were going to "get" - has got me by the balls.

[to Tommy]
You think guys like this are ever going to do business with you? Why don't you wise up. No one, I am telling you, no one in Beverly Hills is *ever* going to do business with a black man.
